version_description:
1. Bind to Email to activate Password Retieval. Players who are signed-in: bind your account to email by tapping Avatar - Settings - Account Center. After binding, you can tap "Forgot Password" on the login page to reset.
2. UI improvements and general bug fixes.

1. Bind to Email to activate Password Retieval. Players who are signed-in: bind your account to email by tapping Avatar - Settings - Account Center. After binding, you can tap "Forgot Password" on the login page to reset.
2. UI improvements and general bug fixes.

This app has been updated by Apple to use the latest Apple signing certificate.

1. Now you can select a game language to enter the server of different region.
If you want to change your region, you can find language setting in avatar to reselect your game language.
2. Minor bug fixes and performance improvements.
